scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/assets dist/ && cp src/index-github.html dist/index.html && mkdir -p dist/pages && cp src/pages/diary-display.html dist/pages/ && mkdir -p dist/data && cp -r server/data/*.json dist/data/ && cp src/assets/js/api.js dist/assets/js/ && cp src/assets/js/main.js dist/assets/js/ && cp src/assets/css/style.css dist/assets/css/
